==Trivia==
*The Chinese and Japanese names of the constellation {{Lang|Let the Water Burst into a Valley|zh=决水于溪|zh_rm=Jué Shuǐ Yú Xī|ja=水を渓に決する|ja_rm=Mizu wo Tani ni Kessuru<!--assumed reading -->|sort=zh,ja}} are likely references to a phrase from {{w|Sun Tzu}}'s ''{{w|The Art of War}}'': {{Lang|"the onrush of a conquering force is like the bursting of pent-up waters into a chasm a thousand fathoms deep"|zh=称胜者之战民也，若决积水于千仞之溪者，形也}} (trans. by {{w|Lionel Giles}}<ref>Sun Tzu. [https://gutenberg.org/ebooks/132 Project Gutenberg: The Art of War] trans. by Lionel Giles, 1910.</ref>).
